title: Cozy Shared Home in San Fran!
posting_body: The Loft is a cozy 7-person home in San Fran!
We are a group of 7 individuals who value inclusions, community building, and collaboration.
We all have our private rooms that are partially furnished, and share bathrooms, kitchens, and living spaces.
We are looking for 2 roomates coming up in August and September.
Both rooms are $1,350/mo (for standard year leases), 100square feet, and has a $100/mo utility fee that covers all utilities and monthly professional cleanings in the space.
**Short-term leases are available for a fee.
If you're looking to live collaboratively, reach out!
We'd love to schedule a tour with you.
